item.name: Change F1..F19 Key & Functional Key (Brightness Control, Music Control, Volume Control)
Fn+Functional Keys to F1..F12
item.appendix: (Use these settings if you activated "XXX to Fn")

item.name: Fine grained brightness controls
item.appendix: Enables fine grained brightness controls by default
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_UP, ModifierFlag::FN | ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_UP, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
__KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_DOWN, ModifierFlag::FN | ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::BRIGHTNESS_DOWN, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L

item.name: Fine grained keyboard backlighting controls
item.appendix: Enables fine grained backlighting controls by default
item.autogen: __ConsumerToConsumer__ ConsumerKeyCode::KEYBOARDLIGHT_HIGH, ModifierFlag::FN | ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::KEYBOARDLIGHT_HIGH, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
__ConsumerToConsumer__ ConsumerKeyCode::KEYBOARDLIGHT_LOW, ModifierFlag::FN | ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::KEYBOARDLIGHT_LOW, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L

item.name: Fine grained volume controls
item.appendix: Enables fine grained volume controls by default
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_UP, ModifierFlag::FN | ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_UP, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
__KeyToKey__ ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_DOWN, ModifierFlag::FN | ModifierFlag::NONE, ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_DOWN, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L

item.name: Keyboard Light Off to Music Next
Keyboard Light Off to Music Play/Pause
Keyboard Light Low to Music Next
Keyboard Light Off to Music Prev
Keyboard Light Low to Music Play/Pause
Keyboard Light High to Music Next
Keyboard Light Low to Tab Left ( Command+{ )
Keyboard Light High to Tab Right ( Command+} )
Keyboard Light High to Volume Mute
MacBookAir3,1 (MacBook Air Late 2010) to Previous Model
item.appendix: *** We recommend you to use "NoEjectDelay" together when you change eject key.

item.name: Functionalize 2.0
item.appendix: You need to turn "Use all F1, F2, etc. keys as standard function keys" off.
Open System Preferences > Keyboard, and turn it off.

item.name: Fn - Tap for Real FnLock
item.appendix: This enables FnLock and disables all consumer keys

item.name: Fn - Tap to Enable Fn Keys Only
item.appendix: This enables disables all consumer keys only

item.name: Disable F[3-6] Consumer Keys and set to F[14-17],
F1..F12 to Functional Keys (Brightness Adjust, Music Control, etc)
Fn+F1..F12 to Functional Keys (Brightness Adjust, Music Control, etc)
item.appendix: (Use these settings if you activated "XXX to Fn")

item.name: F1 to Brightness Down (except virtual machine, RDC)
F2 to Brightness Up (except virtual machine, RDC)
Volume controls by F1,F2 and F3
F3 to Volume Mute (except virtual machine, RDC)
F4 to Volume Down (except virtual machine, RDC)
F5 to Volume Up (except virtual machine, RDC)
F3,F4 to Mission Control,Launchpad (except in Virtual Machine/RDP)
F5/F6 to Volume Down/Up without click
F5, F6, and F7 to iTunes music controls
F6 to Virtual NumLock
item.appendix: Unlike Fn_Lock, retaining cursor keys, delete key.

item.name: F6 to Fn_Lock (except virtual machine, RDC)
F7 to Video Mirror (except virtual machine, RDC)
F8 to Keyboard Light Off (except virtual machine, RDC)
F9 to Keyboard Light LOW (except virtual machine, RDC)
F10 to Keyboard Light HIGH (except virtual machine, RDC)
F7 to Music Prev (except virtual machine, RDC)
F8 to Music Play/Pause (except virtual machine, RDC)
F9 to Music Next (except virtual machine, RDC)
F10 to Volume Mute (except virtual machine, RDC)
F11 to Volume Down (except virtual machine, RDC)
F12 to Volume Up (except virtual machine, RDC)
F10,F11,F12 to speaker control.
item.appendix: F11,F12 to volume control by 1/4-notch intervals.
Holding F10 key to open sound preferences.
Holding F11,F12 key to volume control by normal intervals.
item.autogen: __HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::F10, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_VOLUME_MUTE, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_VOLUME_MUTE, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION

__HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::F11, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_VOLUME_DOWN, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_VOLUME_DOWN,

__HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::F12, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_VOLUME_UP, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_VOLUME_UP,

item.name: F13 to Volume Mute (except virtual machine, RDC)
F14 to Volume Down (except virtual machine, RDC)
F15 to Volume Up (except virtual machine, RDC)
F12 to Move focus to active or next window (Control+F4)
F12 to Move focus to active or next window (Control+F4)
item.appendix: (+ F12 to Control_L if you held down F12 key)

item.name: Change Command+F1...F12 to Functional Keys
item.appendix: (ex. F10 to Volume Mute, F11 to Volume Down)

item.name: Change F1...F12 to Functional Keys (except Terminal)
item.appendix: (ex. F10 to Volume Mute, F11 to Volume Down)

item.name: Force change F1..F12 in VMware, Parallels, RDC
Macbook family: Keyboard Preferences Configured to Standard Function Keys
F1,F2 to Brightness Adjust (except in Parallels/RDP)
F3,F4 to Mission Control/Launchpad (except in Parallels/RDP)
F7,F8,F9 to Music Controls (except in Parallels/RDP), Macbook Pro Version
F10,F11,F12 to Speaker Controls (except in Parallels/RDP), Macbook Pro Version
For MacbookAir3,1 (Macbook Air Late 2010)
item.appendix: Keyboard Preferences Configured to Standard Function Keys

item.name: F1,F2 to Brightness Adjust (except in Parallels/RDP)
F3,F4 to Mission Control/Launchpad (except in Parallels/RDP)
F6,F7,F8 to Music Controls (except in Parallels/RDP)
F9,F10,F11 to Speaker Controls (except in Parallels/RDP)
F1..F12 to Functional (except virtual machine, RDC)
F5,F6 to Functional (except virtual machine, RDC)
Fn+F1..F12 to Functional
item.appendix: There is this setting for "* to Fn". (ex: Control_L to Fn)

item.name: Change f1...f12 to brightness control, volume control, etc.
item.appendix: (You can use standard function keys by fn-f1...fn-f12.)

item.name: Change fn-f1...f12 to brightness control, volume control, etc.
item.appendix: (Please use "Change XXX to fn" setting together.)
